solution_line_template: The back wheel has double the spokes the front wheel has, which means the back wheel has {front_wheel_spokes}*{multiplier_for_back_wheel}=<<{front_wheel_spokes}*{multiplier_for_back_wheel}={back_wheel_spokes}>>{back_wheel_spokes} spokes.
In total, the bicycle has {front_wheel_spokes}+{back_wheel_spokes}=<<{front_wheel_spokes}+{back_wheel_spokes}={total_spokes}>>{total_spokes} spokes.
